translations: 处罚，处刑；使不利（penalize 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Foul play will be severely penalized.
sentences.translation: 比赛犯规将受到严厉处罚。

sentences.sentence: You will be penalized for poor spelling.
sentences.translation: 你拼写不好将会受到处罚。

sentences.sentence: Team members will be penalized for lateness.
